oaidtb.boosters
Class AdaBoostECC

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--weka.classifiers.Classifier
        |
        +--weka.classifiers.DistributionClassifier
              |
              +--oaidtb.boosters.Booster
                    |
                    +--oaidtb.boosters.AdaBoostOC
                          |
                          +--oaidtb.boosters.AdaBoostECC
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, ErrorUpperBoundComputer, IterativeUpdatableClassifier, weka.core.OptionHandler, java.io.Serializable, weka.core.WeightedInstancesHandler
public class AdaBoostECC
extends AdaBoostOC

Class for boosting using AdaBoostECC. For more information, see

Venkatesan Guruswami and Amit Sahai. Multiclass Learning, Boosting and Error Correcting Codes. Proceedings of COLT'99.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Santiago David Villalba Bartolomé
See Also:
